item.description:
Join us when we will discuss the controversial novel "The DaVinci Code" by Dan Brown. The aim of this first session is to consider the literary merits of the book. We'll more than likely hold a second session in the near future to consider the novel's spin on history.
There are quite a few copies of this book in Connecticut public libraries as well as in book stores and at Amazon.com.

This link will take you to the book at amazon.com:
http://www.amazon.com...

For more information, see http://www.cthumanist...
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Book Discussion
